review: Cant go wrong. Great quality on a budget price  - Hosa is the go to when you need to hook things up
What was it, brillcream? a dab will do ya?Something like that -This is all you need for contact cleaning. Worth the coin.
For me, I can click this in so it is a nearly perfect height. The padding is great, it is lightweight without feeling cheep.
Not sure why Behringer gets a bad rep - this is compact, works as advertised, is affordable and an all around handy thing for the musician.Well built, solid construction - zero complaints.
I share most of the same sentiments.The pads are a little stiff, but this works, does the job and is such a small package!Fit's in my Macbook bag -

Still glad I have it -Would prefer to exchange a slightly larger package for full size keys, and the action is a little weak - less than 'synth' action..but it works great, weighs almost nothing and is ultra-portable.
